title: Mouse Cursor Too Small?
body: I recently upgraded to a new computer and new monitor.  Unfortunately this made my cursor SUPER small, I can't see it in any team fights... messing with the resolutions, but nothing works.  Any help?

replies.body: Grats on your new rig!  Are you using a 4K now?  4K isn't totally supported yet, so you may run into issues especially if exceeding 1920x1080.  You'll want to scale down both your native and in-game resolution to fix this up.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aFIjL8VJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-11T18:21:36.782+0000)
>
> Grats on your new rig!  Are you using a 4K now?  4K isn't totally supported yet, so you may run into issues especially if exceeding 1920x1080.  You'll want to scale down both your native and in-game resolution to fix this up.

Any plans on supporting adjustable in-game cursor sizes, despite resolutions?
Do you have any clue when 4k is going to be supported? Even if you lower your resolution back to 1920x1080 if you tab out the cursor stays small for the rest of the game{{item:3070}}
I just don't understand how the hell this has not been fixed yet when this has been a known issue since 2016??? How the hell can a company that earns so many damn millions not be able to fix this?

Yes, I am using a 4K.  

And that's super sad.  I would imagine a lot of League players use 4K.  Any chance this will be focused on fixing in the future?  

Thanks so much.
